edu.illinois.geoalarm

Class AlarmService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.AlarmService

  • public class AlarmService
extends Service
    This Service is launched when a trip is planned. It monitors the current time/location, and then it signals the RouteMap service to sound the alarm.
    Author:
    GeoAlarm

    • Nested Class Summary

      class  AlarmService.AlarmServiceBinder
      This inner class extends the Binder class, and allows us to return a Service binder to an Activity.
